response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I trust that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
